title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 662.1 - Purpose of the balance sheet accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 662.1 - Purpose of the balance sheet accounts

State Regulations

The balance sheet accounts (1130 to 4550.3, inclusive)
are designed to show the assets, liabilities, capital stock, and retained
earnings or deficit of the company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
662.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
